v0.20-beta Changelogï¼š
+ Wwise Tool: Added extensive debug information for improved troubleshooting. + Wwise: Introduced a new feature to import .wav files directly from selected containers in Wwise into the Reaper project. + Element Split: Performance optimizations and efficiency improvements. + Sample Broker: Added support for direct .wav file imports into the Ling Sampler. + Security: General security enhancements and optimizations.
